diagram:
@startuml
actor Patient
actor Doctor
actor Receptionist
rectangle ClinicSystem {
    usecase "Schedule Appointment" as UC1
    usecase "Cancel Appointment" as UC2
    usecase "Reschedule Appointment" as UC3
    usecase "View Appointment Schedule" as UC4
    usecase "Manage Patient Information" as UC5
}
Patient --> UC1 : schedule
Patient --> UC2 : cancel
Patient --> UC3 : reschedule
Patient --> UC4 : view
Doctor --> UC1 : schedule
Doctor --> UC3 : reschedule
Doctor --> UC4 : view
Receptionist --> UC1 : assist
Receptionist --> UC2 : assist
Receptionist --> UC3 : assist
Receptionist --> UC4 : assist
Receptionist --> UC5 : manage
UC1 .> UC5 : <<include>>
UC2 .> UC5 : <<include>>
UC3 .> UC5 : <<include>>
@enduml
raw_diagram:
@startuml
actor Patient
actor Doctor
actor Receptionist

rectangle ClinicSystem {
    usecase "Schedule Appointment" as UC1
    usecase "Cancel Appointment" as UC2
    usecase "Reschedule Appointment" as UC3
    usecase "View Appointment Schedule" as UC4
    usecase "Manage Patient Information" as UC5
}

Patient --> UC1 : schedule
Patient --> UC2 : cancel
Patient --> UC3 : reschedule
Patient --> UC4 : view

Doctor --> UC1 : schedule
Doctor --> UC3 : reschedule
Doctor --> UC4 : view

Receptionist --> UC1 : assist
Receptionist --> UC2 : assist
Receptionist --> UC3 : assist
Receptionist --> UC4 : assist
Receptionist --> UC5 : manage

UC1 .> UC5 : <<include>>
UC2 .> UC5 : <<include>>
UC3 .> UC5 : <<include>>
@enduml
